medium: Porcelain with overglaze enamel decor, Seal mark <I>chih<I> (made to command) Famille verte ware
title: Plate
description: Plate, porcelain, famille verte enamels (turquoise, blue, iron-red, black and gold). Scene of mythical battle. Emperor Liu Xuan with attendants observes battle in which demon General Wang Mang astride a qilin participates.
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Frederick B. Wells
